name: Larry Carter
content: Larry Carter's Home Page Larry Carter Computer Science and Engineering Dept. University of California, San Diego 9500 Gilman Drive, Mail Code 0404 La Jolla, CA 92093-0404 Email: carter at cs.ucsd.edu I am happily acting as a Professor Emeritus in UCSD's CSE department . I am frequently sighted on campus, but I am not taking on new students. Summer 2005 I taught in UCSD's COSMOS program. Here are some related files. Some research areas I have worked in include: heterogeneous computing, performance programming and hierarchical tiling. Here are some of my papers. Some courses I've taught include graduate algorithms, parallel computation, architecture, and performance programming. Here's a short biography. Personal: A picture from the cover of my CD of new-age-y music.
